tool_description: A SPRL "Short a Single URL" API helps you to create a shorten url for your long, wide url.
name: Short a Single URL
title: Short a Single URL

api_list.name: Bulk URL(s) Short
api_list.description: You can call "Bulk URL(s) Short" API to programmatically create thousands of shorten URLs for longer URLs by calling a single API request. You can use your own branded domain or SPRL default domain and also you can set the expiry date for the campaign.

api_list.name: Short a Single URL
api_list.description: Get a short url in response
